website_summaries.verdict: Indeed a fun cupcake maker that bakes 6 cupcakes in 3 steps: use your best-loved box or scratch recipe, bake and cook.
pros: Has bright red and green indicator lights to show machine is ready for baking
Browns muffin tops, cooks smoothly and evenly
Cleans up with a paper towel or damp sponge
cons: you must keep watch so cupcakes don't burn
Needs a temperature control and liners are needed to achieve perfect shape

customer_reviews.title: Much more than a cupcake maker
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite kitchen gadgets! We use this for so many things. We do cinnamon rolls, cornbread muffins, banana bread muffins, pumpkin bread muffins, cupcakes and little breakfast egg muffins. Quick to heat up. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pwilson9721

customer_reviews.title: Cupcakes :)
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday. Made some cupcakes with my little girl and it turned out great. Fast, easy, and clean up was a piece of cake. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: MsVang

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I used a spatula to turn the cupcakes over and tongues with rubber ends. Otherwise I burn myself. Fast and easy. Be careful with the lid. It seems loose to me. You will enjoy. I didn't fill them all up and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ssrtip

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! I wish I knew this existed sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It took a few tries to figure out how long to leave the cupcakes in, but now that she’s gotten the hang of it, she uses it a couple times a week! Purchased for my 10 year old for her bday who LOVES baking. This allows her to bake without my help since she isn’t using the actual oven. I’m very pleased!

customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it! It is full blown appliance not just a light bulb in a oven or something. Now she can make her own cupcakes with a little help from mommy.

customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this. Definitely over excited. I got this as a bday present to myself because my oven doesn't work well for baking and I love making cupcakes. Sadly this was a disappointment. I did what the instructions said and I couldn't get the cupcakes out! Completely ripped them apart...they were mostly just muffin tops. Plus these are not regular sized cupcakes like in description, they are mini!! I'm going to try a different recipe and see if I get better results...but for now this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I so love this cupcake maker. The actual cupcake size is smaller than standard, but with my original cupcake batter (whole wheat, dates, applesauce, and olive oil) the cupcakes were done in ten minutes and ready to eat once cooled. The tops were a little browner than I would have liked, overall my daughter enjoyed making her first batch of cupcakes without disaster and can't wait to make more. The smile on her face alone was worth it, especially when her cupcakes were what she had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Come out perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old and she loved it. She's made cupcakes, pizza bites and corn dogs!

customer_reviews.text: I ENJOY MAKING CUPS CAKES SO I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE EASIER IF I PURCHASED THIS CUPCAKE MAKER. VERY BAD CHOICE. TRIED COOKING MUFFINS THE FIRST AND HAD TO ALMOST BURN THEM BEFORE THEY WERE DONE. SOME WERE STILL RAW IN THE MIDDLE. SAVE YOUR MONEY..DON'T BELIEVE THE REVIEWS.
customer_reviews.author: georgiette m.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little device!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! My husband's co-worker had brought one in to work for a team-building day and he loved it so much, I ordered this that night. It came SUPER quickly and we had it plugged in and cooking as soon as we got it! The cupcakes turned out SO perfectly and they are super smooth and evenly cooked. You have to fill the cups completely to get that perfect shape, and watch the time on them as they cook. We started with some carrot-raisin cupcakes and they were really delish! I love that I can just make one or two without dirtying a whole baking tray or heating up the house :) Huge bonus living in Florida!!!
customer_reviews.author: RobertsBrianna

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kitchen cool
customer_reviews.text: I really hesitated on this because the last thing I need is another kitchen appliance, and I wasn't familiar with this maker at all. So glad I went for it: it makes great cupcakes and muffins without heating up the kitchen, and the tops turn out high and round, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Crusie Smith

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my 12yr old daughter who ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 12yr old daughter who loves to back. She is able to bake a set of cupcakes all by herself (with my minimal supervision of course.) We used the cupcake liners with not problem. It makes it easier to decorate while holding. We mastered it about 8 minutes for regular cupcakes. The instruction book also has recipes she is excited to try.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious cupcakes in just minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This makes cupcakes in a snap. It makes regular sized cupcakes in just minutes. I can have cupcakes made and sitting on a cooling rack in less time than it takes to heat up my gas oven. I have used paper and silicone cupcake liners and both work well. I even use it to cook biscuits and they also cook in less time than it takes to heat my gas oven. Now I can make cupcakes or biscuits on a hot summer day without heating up my house. It would make a terrific gift.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Holstein Muffin Girl
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy, perfect for making muffins for just a few people. Martha White small package of muffin mix makes 4 or 5 muffins, not quite 6. Which works out ok for us, since there are just two of us. As another reviewer said, works better with slightly thicker batter. I used real blueberries in some of the muffins, and muffins came out of oiled cavities with no problems. Bits of stuck on blueberry came out easily by drizzling some oil on it and letting it sit until cool.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Really nifty! I like to buy those little pouches of muffin mix, but hate using my oven to make six muffins. This is quicker and more economical! I do suggest buying metal muffin liners to use with this. The paper ones tend to smoke.
customer_reviews.author: AmentLVR

customer_reviews.title: Works great until the top falls off
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the top keeps falling off! My 8 year-old step daughter loves to bake and I don't worry about her with this. It bakes cupcakes quickly and easily; however, when the top falls off it's hard to get back on and that does make me worry. As an adult it's hard to replace without burning myself...with a kid, even more.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, easy to clean. My 8 yr old niece absolutely loves this and is so proud that she can make cupcakes and muffins without any help. She wanted an Easy Bake oven but the food that comes out of those is disgusting and the packets are expensive. If anyone asks you for an easy bake oven, this is an EXCELLENT replacement. We presented it with a ton of sprinkles and she threw all of her other toys to the side and wanted to make cupcakes immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeze

customer_reviews.title: ... gate I made cupcakes and it was so unbelievable EASY! I burned my finger on the plate
customer_reviews.text: Right out the gate I made cupcakes and it was so unbelievable EASY! I burned my finger on the plate, I should have been more cautious, does heat up quickly, BE CAREFUL. Cupcakes were great and again so dang easy to use! Will definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: The cupcake maker was a fun solution to the problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cupcake maker for a workers children. There is a 4 year old that loves cupcakes. I has been so hot in Los Angeles that no one wants to heat up the house with the oven heat. The cupcake maker was a fun solution to the problem. After the the first cake mix, the children went crazy because they could make their own cupcakes. The whole family enjoyed and I was thrilled over the purchase. They used regular sized cupcake papers and cooked the cupcakes for 7 to 8 minutes. I would recommend this appliance for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Cain

customer_reviews.title: This product seems to be of better quality than most of the counter top items I ...
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be of better quality than most of the counter top items I have bought in the past. Have used it twice, and think I am pleased. Would probably purchase a similar product, if made by Holstein.
customer_reviews.author: Salty

customer_reviews.title: Practical and fun machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. It folds for storage, and makes great muffins/cakes. Yes, it would be nice if there was an indicator light telling when the cakes were done; but since batter often consists of different thicknesses (excluding the prepackaged mixes) this system seems practical. Oh and it's also lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Rere

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOVE this thing!!!! I don't have to turn on the oven and heat up my kitchen or deal with oven mitts and reusing my muffin pan and the mess! This thing is so easy to use, easy to clean and user friendly! The cupcakes are on the smaller side but that just means you make more! :)
customer_reviews.author: Waytoomuchshopping

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Cupcakes in 7 minutes and muffins in 9. Tried mixes as well as scratch recipes. Used with and without liners. Perfect everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Eladyeb

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ticket! Got rid of my big oven, our electric rates are jumping from 6 to 16, so I am buying individual devices that quickly cook without heating a big oven for just one person. Received this today, and made muffins for the bird feeder, the stray cats, and myself. We are one happy camper! Seriously, I make whole grain nutritious muffins, this device is so fast compared to the oven I was using, I'm sure the electric bill will show the savings. Easy wipe up. It's almost magic. update, also cooked eggs, so now I have breakfast muffins

customer_reviews.text: The unit works as advertised. It starts baking as you pour, so you must develop a system for pouring. Some ingredients take longer than others to bake. Other than that, people seemed to be satisfied with the cupcakes.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So I just got this today and decided not to wait to try it well it is amazing, it's fantastic. I made 6 chocolate cupcakes and they came out perfect and beautiful. I can't wait to make cupcakes with my granddaughter. Do not wait if you are thinking of purchasing this you will definitely love it. So coming back this evening 3/13/13 to say that I just tasted one of the cupcakes I made earlier today and it was AWESOME! My man had two with a cup of coffee and said "they are soft, fresh and tasty delicious". Great little machine. I am planning to buy another one and send it to my sister in Puerto Rico.

customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have used it several times already. It makes delicious cupcakes. Very simple and fast.

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect cupcakes. FUN.
customer_reviews.text: This is a little fun machine. Does 6 cakes/muffins at a time. Average time 10 mins to cook. Make sure your muffin batter isn't too thick or it won't cook in the middle. It also did cornbread very well. I didn't need any paper ups, they popped right out. Worth the money. Oh, plus it's pretty small. Folds up and stands up. Nice space saver.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's birthday and we really like it. We use almost every morning to make muffins. It is easy to use and clean. I use paper and silicone liners (silicone increases the cooking time) for super easy clean up. It nice and compact and stand on its side so it stores easily. The shipping was REALLY slow so order early if this is going to be a gift. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: rich cupcakes

product_meta.title: Holstein Housewares HF-09013E Fun Cupcake Maker - Teal
product_meta.description: The Holstein Housewares FUN Cupcake Maker bakes 6 delicious cupcakes in minutes with just 3 easy steps. Prepare your favorite recipe, pour in the batter, allow them to bake and you're ready to enjoy. Making cupcakes has never been as easy as with the Cupcake Maker. No longer do you need to preheat an oven, use multiple pans or worry about a messy clean up. The Cupcake Maker has a non-stick coating for easy clean up and upright space-saving storage feature to maximize your kitchen space. Its innovative design allows for the maker to maintain optimal heat while baking your treats, and the indicator light lets you know when the maker is on and ready to bake. The non-slip feet and safety lock make for safe baking. Simplify your life in the kitchen with the Holstein Housewares FUN Cupcake Maker.
